page.title: 03Steeple Bumpstead cont.
page.content: all the village people,It was so fine and tall and stately, No wonder they admired it greatly." There are about {1,000}people living in the village, and in 1978 when a survey was done by W.E.A. about three quarters of the working population were employed in the village or within 5 miles of it. 28% of the adults living in Bumpstead at that time were born in the village and had lived there most of their lives. The parish provides a variety of employment with emphasis on {agriculture}and allied services,two firms in the village being contractors engaged in the distribution and repair of agricultural machinery. There are also two firms of builders, one of which is run by the old Bumpstead family, the Argents.There is also the distribution depot of a national bakery.
